title: Bewitching the Enemy
description: A paranormal category romance from Entangled's Covet imprint...Rebuilding New Orleans...one witch at a timeContractor Storm Morgeaux is trying to keep her business afloat and not sleep with the hot-'n'-sexy new client, Dr. Nathan Davis. Adding to her troubles is the fact she accidentally released a series of dark spells. Now evil warlocks are after her family, and she has no idea who she can trust.Nathan's biggest concern is getting his pediatric surgery center up and running. Still, his stunning new contractor provides plenty of distraction?until she sets off his Paladin medallion. A warlock is near. Nathan's first responsibility is eliminating the woman who wields new and dangerous magic. But something about Storm calls to him. She's mysterious, sexy, and downright irresistible, but most surprisingly, his.Without the spells, Storm must learn to trust her new abilities. But can she trust the man who's torn between loving her...and killing her?
author: Dawn Chartier
